list.name: Photos
list.rawQuery:
SELECT app || ' access ' || category || ' for ' || (timeend - time)::TEXT AS text,
       category || ',' || app                              AS tags,
       time,
       timeend
FROM (SELECT id,
             max(category)                                   AS category,
             max(kind)                                       AS kind,
             max(app)                                        AS app,
             min(ts) FILTER ( WHERE kind = 'intervalBegin' ) AS time,
             max(ts) FILTER ( WHERE kind = 'intervalEnd' )   AS timeend
      FROM applog.privacy_log
      WHERE app = '${app}' AND id IS NOT NULL AND category = 'photos'
      GROUP BY id
     ) d
ORDER BY time;

list.name: Contacts
list.rawQuery:
SELECT app || ' access ' || category || ' for ' || (timeend - time)::TEXT AS text,

       time,
